thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BankNordik Completes Sale Of Office Property For DKK 140 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BankNordik Completes Sale Of Office Property For DKK 140 Million

organizations.name: banknordik completes sale of office property for dkk

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - BANKNORDIK P/F:
* BANKNORDIK COMPLETES SALE AND LEASEBACK OF HEAD OFFICE PROPERTY FOR DKK 140M
* ‍TRANSACTION TRIGGERS A PRE-TAX GAIN ON SALE OF DKK 70M AND A CAPITAL RELIEF OF 0.7 PERCENTAGE POINTS​
* ‍IS ADJUSTING ITS FY2018 NET PROFIT GUIDANCE UPWARDS FROM EARLIER ANNOUNCED DKK 100-150M TO DKK 150-200M.​
* ‍GUIDANCE ON OPERATING PROFIT BEFORE IMPAIRMENT CHARGES IN RANGE OF DKK 160-200M IS RECONFIRMED.​ Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
